bibl.title: The Regulation of the Ptolemaieia: A Hypothesis Explored. Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
bibl.note: Ptolemy II introduced a new era throughout his realm because he wished to fix the Ptolemaieia to the winter of every quadrennial year in and after 262 B.C.
bibl.seg: HAZZARD R.A. and M. Pim Vatter FITZGERALD, The Regulation of the Ptolemaieia: A Hypothesis Explored. Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
J. Roy. Astron. Soc. Can. 85, 1 (1991) pp. 6-23, 4 figg.
Ptolemy II introduced a new era throughout his realm because he wished to fix the Ptolemaieia to the winter of every quadrennial year in and after 262 B.C.
